query:
WITH old_state AS (
                SELECT id, edited_at FROM users
                WHERE id = $1 OR email = $2
            ),
            updated_state AS (
                UPDATE users
                SET
                    edited_at = CASE
                        WHEN deleted_at IS NULL THEN now()
                        ELSE edited_at
                    END,
                    deleted_at = CASE
                        WHEN deleted_at IS NULL THEN now()
                        ELSE deleted_at
                    END
                WHERE id = $1 OR email = $2
                RETURNING *
            )
            SELECT
                u.*,
                os.edited_at AS "old_edited_at"
            FROM updated_state u
            JOIN old_state os ON u.id = os.id
